title: Apollo soyuz
creator_credit: Screen Presentation, David Gerber and Byron Morgan
brief_description: Describes the agreements and preparation for the 1975 Apollo Soyuz international space mission. The United States and the USSR May 1972 agreement for this joint mission in space includes standardization of docking procedures and equipment that will increase safety, provides for dual rescue missions, and opens up new opportunities for further research and discoveries. Narrated by Yul Brynner and Paul Picerni.
